We do it all for you Packages


If you want to get a professional looking website and email for your business, brand or cause and you don't want figure it all out for yourself, our "We do it all for you" Packages are ideal for you.

We will meet with you in person or interact via email or phone to find out what you want to achieve with your web presence and design your web presence based on your description and the information you provide.

A designer will spend up to 3 hours with you to determine what you want, make recommendations and with your approval design and develop the website, set up all the settings and to optimise the website with basic search engine optimisation.

Yebolocal websites are mostly, with a few exceptions, made up out of static web pages. Static web pages load faster, have much fewer errors and are much more secure.

You will have the opportunity to request reasonable revisions to the website until you are happy with the final product.

All packages are pay as you go, with no commitments, you pay for what you want and can stop the service at any time.

Website Design


You get a fully featured website with up to 20 pages , designed based on what you tell us you want.

Some of the elements we can include in your website:

  • A contact form where website visitors can send you a message directly from your website.
  • Social media share buttons so that website visitors can easily share one of your web pages with others.
  • Connections to social media profiles from your website.
  • An embedded Google map so that people can see where your business is located.
  • A 'Frequently Asked Questions' section so that you can provide answers to the most common questions you get asked.
  • An image slider that rotates and shows a series of images.
  • Image banners displaying a horizontal image.
  • and more

Don't worry if you don't know which elements to pick, the designer can give you advice on how you can use the elements and can recommend which ones to choose.




Web Hosting


All "We do it all for you" packages include web hosting.

Fast reliable web hosting, with a 99% guaranteed uptime.

Unlimited storage space for your website files and unlimited bandwidth.




Domain Name Registration


You tell us what you would like your domain to be, and we will take care or the rest by checking if its available, registering it and takings care of all the settings.

Help your customers easily find your website by using a memorable domain name. Use your domain name in an advertisements, on a your business card or wherever.

There are various GTLD's to choose from.

Example: yourbusiness.com




Email


The standard and ultimate package include email accounts.

Professional email can improve the image of your business and set you apart from competitors who do not have email or who use free consumer email accounts for their business communications.




Website Updates


Each package include free website update time, this can be used if you need to add more information to your website or want to make small changes.

Additional website update time will be at a cost of R100/ hour.




Video


The standard and ultimate packages include video, this is a effective and interesting way to capture the attention of your prospects on the web.

Use video adds to promote your business on the internet. This can be Youtube videos for brand awareness or explainer videos. You can also use video in other ways such as for video sales letters or add interactivity to the video.




Social Media


Every social media profile needs images to make is stand out, the standard and ultimate packages include social media images.

We can design professional and effective images for you to use as profile pictures, headers and backgrounds for your social media profiles, including Facebook, Twitter, Youtube and more.

We can also design a social media plan for your business, to help you make effective use of social media to promote your brand.




Content


Keep your prospects engaged by sharing web content with them, this can help remind them of your business and possibly get them to buy from you again, the ultimate package includes monthly web content.

This includes blog posts, social media updates, email newsletters and more . We can also provide social media campaign support in the form of helping to generate content for your social media profiles and helping you manage the process.
